009package imagingbook.common.ransac;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
012
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line.LineFit;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line.OrthogonalLineFitEigen;
016import imagingbook.common.geometry.line.AlgebraicLine;
017
018/**
019 * RANSAC detector for straight lines.
020 * 
021 * @author WB
022 * 
023 * @see AlgebraicLine
024 * @see RansacCurveDetector
025 *
026 */
027public class RansacDetectorLine extends RansacCurveDetector<AlgebraicLine>{
028        
029        private final Parameters params;
030        
031        /**
032         * Nested class extending {@link RansacCurveDetector.RansacParameters} 
033         * to specify additional RANSAC parameters.
034         */
035        public static class Parameters extends RansacCurveDetector.RansacParameters {
036                
037                /** The minimum distance between two random sample points. */
038                @DialogLabel("Min. distance between sample points")
039                public int minPairDistance;
040                
041                /**
042                 * Constructor used to define default parameter values.
043                 */
044                public Parameters() {
045                        this.maxIterations = 1000;
046                        this.maxInlierDistance = 2.0;
047                        this.minInlierCount = 100;
048                        this.minPairDistance = 25;
049                }       
050        }
051        
052        // constructors ------------------------------------
053        
054        /**
055         * Constructor using specific parameters.
056         * @param params RANSAC parameters
057         */
058        public RansacDetectorLine(Parameters params) {
059                super(2, params);
060                this.params = params;
061        }
062        
063        /**
064         * Constructor using default parameters.
065         */
066        public RansacDetectorLine() {
067                this(new Parameters());
068        }
069        
070        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
071        
072        @Override // override default method to check for min pair distance
073        protected Pnt2d[] drawRandomPoints(Pnt2d[] points) {
074                final int MaxTries = 20;
075                int i = 0;
076                Pnt2d[] draw = super.drawRandomPoints(points);
077                while (draw[0].distanceSq(draw[1]) < sqr(params.minPairDistance) && i < MaxTries) {
078                        draw = super.drawRandomPoints(points);
079                        i++;
080                }
081                return (i < MaxTries) ? draw : null;
082        }
083
084        @Override
085        protected AlgebraicLine fitInitial(Pnt2d[] points) {
086                return AlgebraicLine.from(points[0], points[1]);
087        }
088        
089        @Override
090        protected AlgebraicLine fitFinal(Pnt2d[] inliers) {
091                LineFit fit = new OrthogonalLineFitEigen(inliers);
092                return fit.getLine();
093        }
094
095}
